localizedText.Compare_YT_Chart_Description: Compare time series over an interval.
localizedText.Ends_In_Future: This timerange ends in the future so there is not all data available yet.
localizedText.Timerange_To_Smaller_From: The start timestamp (from) is higher than the end timestamp (to)
localizedText.Refresh_Interval_To_Small: The selected refresh interval is to small. It has to be at least 1 minute.
localizedText.No_Data_For_Source_In_Timerange: For at least one of the selected channels, there is no data for one of the selected timeranges.
localizedText.No_Recordings_Found_For_Source: For at least one of the selected channels, there is no record found.
localizedText.Bar_Interval_To_Small: The configured bar interval size is to small. Using default value instead.
localizedText.Bar_Interval_To_Large: The configured bar interval size is to large. Using Compare Interval Size instead.
localizedText.Time_Input_Wrong_Format: Invalid time entry. Please correct your input.
localizedText.Swiched_ChartType_To_TimeSeries_Bar_Char: Switched chart type to Time Series Bar Chart.
localizedText.To_By_Compare_Interval: For this chart type, the value is determined by the comparison interval and cannot be changed directly. Please adjust the comparison interval instead.
localizedText.Value_Not_Editable: This value is not editable in current configuration.
localizedText.Only_Editable_In_TS_Barchart: This value is only editable in Time Series Bar Chart.
localizedText.Only_Editable_With_Relative_Timerange: This value is only editable when you selected a relative timerange (now - ...)
localizedText.Only_Editable_In_CompareChart: This value is only editable in Compare YT Chart or in Time Series Bar Chart.
